subject: Size of elastomers
description_text:
Hello,
I've asked myself multiple times now, what size of elastomers in the pro x
pedals there are.

Greetings, linus.

conversations.body_text: Hi Linus Mohr,  I have only received one inquiry from you. Please provide your order number and specify which part’s size you need.

Hello,
I havent purchased any product of you yet, but i would like to know what
sizes the brake elastomers on the plus x ultra pedals are
Greetings, linus

service@simsonn.com
